title: [LFM] - Î©MEGA needs players!
body:
**Casual** Bronze 5v5s team looking for:
   - Tank Support Main
   - Mage Mid Main
   - Aggressive Jungle Main
   - Flex who can play well, but has no true main.

We already have:
   - ADC Main
   - Top Main
   - Assassin Mid Main
   - Mage Support Main

Thanks, if you want to join ΩMEGA message me, IGN is: EzeBlood
